MINIMUM_IMAGES_REQUIRED: At least two images are required.
MAXIMUM_IMAGES_EXCEEDED: At most five images are allowed.
REQUIRED_FIELDS_MISSING: Title, latitude, longitude, type, and visibility are required.
TITLE_TOO_LONG: Title must be 255 characters or less.
INVALID_LAT_LONG: Latitude and longitude must be valid numbers.
INVALID_TYPE: Type must be one of the following: park, restaurant, bar, cafe, museum, monument, store, hotel, beach, other.
INVALID_VISIBILITY: Visibility must be one of the following: private, friends, public.
INVALID_RATINGS_FORMAT: Ratings must be an object with label-value pairs.
RATING_OUT_OF_RANGE: Rating for {label} must be a number between 1 and 5.
